name: The Little Brazier
description:
Join the Bluish-Green Productions Discord Server!

A short ~5 minute interactive fiction about a Little Brazier that loses his light. Friendly for all ages, and in fact, was made as a bedtime story.

Controls:
  • Move / alternate dialogue options: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick
  • Talk: Space / Gamepad-South
  • Mute / Unmute Audio: M key
  • Pause: Escape / Start
    • Adjust Font choice from the Pause Menu for Sans-Serif and Dyslexic-friendly options!
Additional Info
  • Made for the Global Game Jam 2021
  • Music by Mark Sparling from the Album "Daily Songs Vol. 30 (December 2018)", Track: Daily December 17 2018 #884 (LSDJ) (used with permission).
